channel.title: Podcasts on Music and Gaming Performance
channel.description: Recent content in Podcasts on Music and Gaming Performance

item.title: Podcast Ep.1: Introduction and Background Research
item.description: This episode of the podcast features Carol Lu and Erica Hwang on the introductory background research of how music in involved with video games and the research results of its influence on the player. These experiments form a foundational model for how this experiment was created.

item.title: Podcast Ep.2: Research Methodology and Procedures
item.description: This episode of the podcast features John Lee on the details, procedures, and a brief discussion on the results on the data. This brief experiment scratches the surface of the relationship between music and performance, and it can serve as a case study to consider the expansion and improvements of the experiment.

item.title: Podcast Ep.3: Future Implications
item.description: This episode of the podcast features Peter Zarakas and Elizabeth Cho on the future implications of the experiment regarding music and performance. The expansion of music and performance extends beyond video games, as video games are not the only type of objective for observing levels of performance.
